__e: And you and I both know that isn't even her shoe.
I know where the money is because of what I saw on her shoes!
Well, what will I do on the father-daughter dance? Ride on her shoe?
Buddy, these are $200 shoes. Don't make me speed walk.
And I think sometimes I still smell it on your baby shoe.
Do you have anything to do with that baby shoe stunt?
If you don't remember, he was telling you to take off your shoes and socks.
lost her footing. She laughed... the way she always laughed. Then she fell over her shoe.
The first time you see me coming any closer, I want you to take off a shoe and clunk me on the head with it.
Could you show us some shoes that will go with this?
You are not only going to offer shoes to your mother, but her freedom.
A beautiful woman fled my house last night and the only clue I have to her identity is this shoe she left behind.
And what's with the shoe in your hand?
You will see... My shoe on your head it will be!
When you saw me on the beach this morning, was I holding a slipper?
Okay. How did her blood get on his shoe?
Well, if his shoe spends time there, maybe he does too.
No, I will not tell you his shoe size.
